brainly_data.question: N almost every developed nation today, it is true that _____ are college students. more females than males more middle-aged adults than emerging adults an equal number of males and females more males than females
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question: N almost every developed nation today, it is true that _____ are college students. more females than males more middle-aged adults than emerging adults an equal number of males and females more males than females
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: More males than females.... but that's a very generic and misleading comment, which doesn't take into account the major for one, nor the number of men to women in the country (if a country has a majority of 63% men, like China, would it make sense to have a majority of 55% women in college??).
